blogPost.excerpt: Learn everything about the undocumented secrets in the popular Laravel framework, that makes you a better and more efficient developer.

blogPost.title: Laravel Secrets - Learn everything about the undocumented secrets in Laravel
blogPost.author: Tom Witkowski

localize.description: 学习关于流行的Laravel框架中的所有未被记录的秘密,让你成为一个更好更有效的开发者.
localize.tagline: 了解Laravel中的一切无证秘密。

previous.excerpt: Onsite.fun is the perfect solution for companies to create and maintain camaraderie when working on a distributed basis. We developed group budgeting, centralized invoicing, recurrent activity bundles, and roles to make it seamless and efficient.
previous.title: Onsite.fun - Build the connection that powers great teams

localize.description: Onsite.fun是一个完美的解决方案，当公司在分布式工作时，可以创造和保持友谊。我们开发了团体预算、集中开票、经常性活动捆绑和角色，使其无缝和高效。
localize.tagline: 建立连接，为伟大的团队提供动力

localize.description: Onsite.fun是一個完美的解決方案，當公司在分佈式工作時，可以創造和保持友誼。我們開發了團體預算、集中開票、經常性活動捆綁和角色，使其無縫和高效。
localize.tagline: 建立連接，爲偉大的團隊提供動力
